title: Kalakalakuthu Lyrics Badri
stanzas:
kalakalakuthu kalakalakuthu
kolusu saththam kalakalakuthu
engal veettukkul dhevathai
vandhuvittaa paaththuko

en annan tholmaele
poomaalai aanaale.
anbaale nam veettai
aalum rani aanaale.

kalakalakuthu kalakalakuthu
kolusu saththam kalakalakuthu
engal veettukkul dhevathai
vandhuvittaa paaththuko

anni un vadivil
annaiyai paarthen
anbinai paarthen
indha sondham oru
aanantham

ondril ondraaga
nenjangal kalakkum
.. thudikkum
indha vazhkai oru
aanantham

thirumangal ellaame
sorgathile mudivaagum
anni ival thirumanamo
sorgathaiye uruvaakkum

neengal tharum
anbinile kuzhanthai
ena maarudhu en manam.

kalakalakuthu kalakalakuthu
kolusu saththam kalakalakuthu
engal veettukkul dhevathai
vandhuvittaa paaththuko

thambi un kurumbai
ival miga rasippaal
thavarugal seithaal
thaaiyai pola ival
kandippaal

thambi nee iravil
thaamathamaaga
veettukkul vandhaal
mutti poada solli
thandippaal

anni oru sol sonnaal
adangiduven anbaale
iraivanukku nandri solvom
ival namakku
kidathathu oru varam
